cases.name: Liyan Mohammed Abdullah Al-Majdalawi
cases.summary: Shot and killed in Gaza in November 2023, in an area where the IDF was operating. The BBC World Service pieced together her story as part of an investigation into children shot during the war.

timeline.event: Liyan Mohammed Abdullah Al-Majdalawi shot in area of IDF operations
BBC World Service investigates and pieces together the circumstances
IDF states details recorded and will be examined by competent authorities

witnesses: Part of BBC investigation gathering accounts from eyewitnesses and human rights organizations
One of 95 cases where children were shot in head or chest during the conflict

mediaLinks.title: Two girls shot in Gaza - BBC pieces together what happened

cases.name: Mira Said Nouri Tanbora
cases.summary: Six-year-old girl killed in Gaza in November 2023, in an area where the IDF was operating. Part of BBC's comprehensive investigation into over 160 cases of children shot during the conflict.

timeline.event: Mira Said Nouri Tanbora shot in area of IDF operations
BBC World Service investigates as part of broader study
Case included in report of 160+ children shot during conflict

witnesses: Eyewitness testimony obtained via human rights organizations and medics
Part of comprehensive BBC investigation into child casualties

mediaLinks.title: Investigation into children shot in Gaza conflict

cases.name: Hind Rami Iyad Rajab
cases.summary: Six-year-old trapped in car with dead family members, made desperate calls for help. UN experts called her killing a war crime. Her story became a symbol of children's suffering in Gaza.

timeline.event: Hind trapped in car with dead family members, calls for help
Ambulance dispatched to rescue Hind after her desperate phone calls
Bodies of Hind and ambulance crew found
UN experts declare killing a war crime

witnesses: Recorded phone calls with Hind pleading for help
Family members testified about the incident

mediaLinks.title: Gaza: Killing of Hind Rajab and her family is a war crime
The story of Hind Rajab became global news

cases.name: Al-Tanani Family Children
cases.summary: Multiple children from the same family killed in a single incident. Represents the broader pattern of entire families being wiped out during the conflict.

timeline.event: Rescue efforts and documentation by local organizations
Case recorded by human rights organizations

witnesses: Neighbors and rescue workers provided testimony
Human rights organizations documented the case
Part of broader pattern of family annihilation
